longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
  nationals of Ireland (Rep.) must be valid for the period of
  intended stay. 

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Additional Information:
- Nationals of Ireland (Rep.) staying in Switzerland for more
  than 3 months must apply for a residence permit.
- Geneva airport (GVA) is located by convention in
  Switzerland
